mapper.select: SELECT E.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM AS accountNum, E.AMOUNT_CURRENT AS amountCurrent, E.AMOUNT_ADJ_CR AS crAmountAdj, E.AMOUNT_ADJ_DR AS drAmountAdj, E.AMOUNT_AUDIT_LAST AS amountAuditLast FROM wp_e E where 1 = 1 and E.STATUS = 'Y' and E.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and E.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT E300.ATTR1 as item, E300.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance, E300.END_BALANCE_CNY as endBalance FROM wp_e300 E300 where 1 = 1 and E300.STATUS = 'Y' and E300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and E300.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT E300D.ITEM as item, E300D.SORT as sort, IF(E300D.END_BALANCE = 0, null, E300D.END_BALANCE) as endBalance, IF(E300D.BEGIN_BALANCE = 0, null, E300D.BEGIN_BALANCE) as beginBalance FROM wp_e300_dis E300D where 1 = 1 and E300D.STATUS = 'Y' and E300D.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and E300D.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY E300D.SORT

SELECT IF(SUM(E300D.END_BALANCE) = 0, null, SUM(E300D.END_BALANCE)) as endBalance, IF(SUM(E300D.BEGIN_BALANCE) = 0, null, SUM(E300D.BEGIN_BALANCE)) as beginBalance FROM wp_e300_dis E300D where 1 = 1 and E300D.STATUS = 'Y' and E300D.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and E300D.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1
SELECT SUM(IFNULL(E300D.END_BALANCE, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(E300D.BEGIN_BALANCE, 0)) FROM wp_e300_dis E300D where 1 = 1 and E300D.STATUS = 'Y' and E300D.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and E300D.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT E310.ATTR2 as item, E310.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance, E310.END_BALANCE_CNY as endBalance FROM wp_e310 E310 where 1 = 1 and E310.STATUS = 'Y' and E310.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and E310.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT E400.ATTR1 AS detailName, IFNULL(E400.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY, 0) AS beginBalance, IFNULL(E400.DR_AMOUNT_CNY, 0) AS drAmount, IFNULL(E400.CR_AMOUNT_CNY, 0) AS crAmount, E400.INTEREST as interest FROM wp_e400 E400 where 1 = 1 and E400.STATUS = 'Y' and E400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and E400.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT E500.ATTR1 AS detailName, E500.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY AS beginBalance, E500.END_BALANCE_CNY as endBalance FROM wp_e500 E500 where 1 = 1 and E500.STATUS = 'Y' and E500.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and E500.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT E600.ATTR1 as item, E600.ATTR4 as detailName, E600.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY as beginBalance, E600.END_BALANCE_CNY as endBalance FROM wp_e600 E600 where 1 = 1 and E600.STATUS = 'Y' and E600.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and E600.PERIOD = #{period}
